telecom.name: Telecom / Network Infrastructure / Remote Site Automation
telecom.description: Telecom companies rely on strong digital presence to reach B2B and B2C audiences. Engagement, content regularity, and technical expertise shared online are key to maintaining reputation and driving business growth.

kpis.name: engagement_rate_linkedin
kpis.label: Engagement Rate (LinkedIn)
kpis.description: Total interactions divided by impressions. Shows how relevant your content is to your audience.
kpis.tooltip: Percentage of impressions that generate an interaction (like, comment, share or click).

kpis.name: engagement_rate_x
kpis.label: Engagement Rate (X)
kpis.description: Interactions divided by impressions on X/Twitter. Indicates how relevant and engaging content is for that platform's audience.
kpis.tooltip: Total interactions per impressions on X. Lower than LinkedIn due to platform dynamics.

kpis.name: avg_engagement_per_post
kpis.label: Avg Engagements per Post
kpis.description: Average number of interactions (likes, comments, shares, clicks) per post. Helps identify if posts resonate regardless of reach.
kpis.tooltip: Absolute number of engagements per post. Good indicator independent of audience size.

kpis.name: click_through_rate
kpis.label: Click-Through Rate
kpis.description: Clicks on post links divided by impressions. Measures how effective your content is at driving traffic or deeper interest.
kpis.tooltip: Percentage of viewers who clicked on links in your posts.

kpis.name: follower_growth_rate
kpis.label: Follower Growth Rate
kpis.description: Monthly percentage increase in followers. Reflects growing brand interest and expanded reach potential.
kpis.tooltip: How fast your audience is growing each month.

kpis.name: share_rate
kpis.label: Share Rate
kpis.description: Shares divided by impressions. Measures how often your content is reshared, increasing organic reach.
kpis.tooltip: Percentage of posts that get shared by viewers.

saas.name: SaaS (Software as a Service)
saas.description: SaaS companies leverage content marketing and thought leadership to stand out in a crowded market. Success is measured by consistent content output, high engagement rates, and growing a professional audience.

kpis.name: engagement_rate_linkedin
kpis.label: Engagement Rate (LinkedIn)
kpis.tooltip: SaaS brands typically see higher engagement due to product-led content.

kpis.name: engagement_rate_x
kpis.label: Engagement Rate (X)
kpis.description: Interactions divided by impressions on X/Twitter.
kpis.tooltip: X is critical for SaaS due to developer community.

kpis.name: avg_engagement_per_post
kpis.label: Avg Engagements per Post
kpis.tooltip: SaaS content often gets high engagement from niche audiences.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Ecommerce brands focus on visual storytelling, product launches, and high-frequency content to drive sales and brand loyalty.

kpis.name: engagement_rate_linkedin
kpis.label: Engagement Rate (LinkedIn)
kpis.tooltip: Lower for B2C ecommerce, higher for B2B marketplace brands.

kpis.name: engagement_rate_x
kpis.label: Engagement Rate (X)
kpis.description: Interactions divided by impressions on X/Twitter.
kpis.tooltip: Visual content and promotions drive engagement.
